scripts.clean: npm run clean -w @electron-covalent/common && npm run clean -w @electron-covalent/core && npm run clean -w @electron-covalent/render
scripts.wipe: npm run clean && rimraf node_modules packages/core/node_modules packages/render/node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.build: npm run build -w @electron-covalent/common && npm run build -w @electron-covalent/core && npm run build -w @electron-covalent/render
scripts.release: npm install && npm run build && npm run test:core && npm run test:render && pnpm -r publish --access public
